plot: Tsukasa, Yoji, and Eiji are friends and members of the motorcycle gang called the Paradise Butterflies. Riding the streets of Hiroshima their goal in life is to top all other gangs in their city.
ending_theme: "Sekai o Tomete" (世界を止めて) by The Collectors
insert_song: "Ai no Kakera" (愛のかけら) by Replica (ep 1)
